name: Sólo una vez cae cada lluvia / Only once does each rain fall
description:
Title: Sólo una vez cae cada lluvia / Only once does each rain fall
Orchestration: Woodwind Quintet.
Year: 2016
Duration: 4:30min approx.

This work for woodwind quintet is a musical and expressive approach to the poetry of Hugo Mujica, who through poetics attempts an explicit renunciation of himself to become an expression of life, establishing an intimate and constant listening to the world. The work is free in structure but condenses in its musical elements a rhythmic and expressive complexity that are born from an extra musical idea derived from Hugo poetry. The new owner of the NFT will receive a downloadable PDF with the Score and an audio file in MP3 format
